import React from 'react' import { Card, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Product({ product }) { const decodedImageUrl = decodeURIComponent(product.image) return ( {product.discountProduct > 0 ? ( <> {product.name}% ) : ( <> {product.name} )} {product.category} - {product.brand} 0 ? '' : 'text-danger'}> {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
{product.discountProduct > 0 ? (

${product.price} ${ (product.price * (1 - 0.01 * product.discountProduct)).toFixed(2) }

%{product.discountProduct} off

 ) : ( ${product.price} )} ) } export default Product
